data.text:
@MemberBernie THIS IS THE SAME THING THEY SAID IN 1996, 2000, 2004, 2008, 2012, 2016 AND WILL BE SAYING FOREVER
The best time to vote #GreenParty is #NOW -- take elections back from the 1% tapeworms sucking us dry -- "DEMS" and "REPUBS" ARE NOT GOVERNING, THEY'RE PLUNDERING AND KILLING US
@MemberBernie Not trying to shame you! Not voting or voting third party is equivalent to voting for trump tho in our present system. That's not shaming. That's reality.
